item.description:
Hi everyone,
We will meet at Houghton's Pond and follow the red dot trail over Breeze Hill to the rigorous climb over Tucker Hill via the popular Skyline Trail. "The Rocky Summit of Buck Hill offers a stellar 360 degree view of the surrounding region and is an invigorating climb." We'll finish on the more leisurely Doe Hollow Path back to Houghton's Pond.

The hike will take 2.5-3 hours, depending on the pace. This challenging hike is for MODERATE/ADVANCED hikers.

Take Exit 3 off 93 South towards Houghton's Pond - follow signs for main parking area at Houghton's Pond. We will meet at the bulletin board.

Please bring enough water (very important) and wear sturdy sneakers/hiking boots. Also, consider bringing a snack, sunscreen, bug spray, sunglasses and a hat.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Sunday morning hike in the Blue Hills - middle Skyline Trail and Buck Hill
